entry.tran: （棒球或板球运动中的）外场手，外野手
entry.def: In baseball and cricket, the outfielders are the players in the part of the field that is furthest from the batting area.

means.word_mean: 1. (baseball) a person who plays in the outfield
2. a fielder in cricket who is stationed in the outfield
